channel.title: Statistics on Wish's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Statistics on Wish's Blog

item.title: CPlogy-Initial Operation Report
item.description: Basic Information Platform: Bilibili Key Account Metrics Shift: Followers increased from 285 to 315, Submissions rose from 47 to 48, Total Views surged from 45,000 to 75,000, Likes jumped from 1,400 to 2,000, Coins went up from 696 to 751, Comments expanded from 277 to 405, Favorites climbed from 1,185 to 1,597, Shares marginally grew from 542 to 552. Positioning & Tone Platform Positioning: A comprehensive entertainment and cultural community
